articles.title: Eric Dier revels in victory as Bayern Munich slams Lazio - Bavarian Football Works
articles.description: Eric Dier has been a good acquisition for Bayern Munich.
articles.content:
Bayern Munich defender Eric Dier was not exactly a popular acquisition during the winter transfer window.
At a time when some fans were expecting the club to splurge on a big name, Dier came on as a… [+1257 chars]
